normalized: it was the morning of the second day, since i had planted the bug in cara.

name: marika
normalized: here you are.

name: cara
normalized: thank you.
her servant brought her her after-meal coffee.
the queen started off by elegantly enjoying its scent.
and then, she took a sip of the black coffee.

name: cara
normalized: this is really delicious, no matter when i drink it.
its mild bitterness together with its strong sourness is suited to my tastes.

name: kitae
normalized: i am glad to hear that.
it is a blend suited to my tastes.
moreover, it is reasonably priced as well.

name: azuma
normalized: i quite like its flavour as well.
all of us were sipping on the hot coffee, with the exception of the knightess.
i glanced at cara's face, however, i couldn't notice much of a difference in her ever since i had started training her with the bug.

name: cara
normalized: hey, kitae.
can you tell me about this shop?

name: kitae
normalized: i don't mind telling you about it, however, you won't be buying the entire shop, will you?

name: cara
normalized: oh… you can see through me wonderfully well.

name: kitae
normalized: come now… you are a celebrity among celebrities after all…
she was enjoying herself as usual, while chatting frivolously with everyone.
however, as i looked at her closely, it seemed like her face had flushed slightly due to the sudden rush of blood.
there was no way that she could be completely composed.
i had injected her with a large amount of the aphrodisiac after all.
she was undoubtedly being tormented by intense sexual pleasure, even though she was moving slightly.
her entire body was bound to be going numb because of it as well.
as a result, her composure definitely wouldn't last for too long.

name: marika
normalized: what are you looking at?

name: yamakawa
normalized: eh!?
before i even knew about it, the knight had stood up, as if to protect the queen.

name: yamakawa
normalized: no, it is just that…

name: marika
normalized: do you just stare at her, whenever you have nothing better to do?
marika, who was always quite unsociable, was giving off a particularly hateful aura today.
was she being cautious of me because of what had happened last night?

name: yamakawa
normalized: we were talking with professor cara, which is why…

name: marika
normalized: i will convey it to her.
was she attempting to keep me away from cara?

name: cara
normalized: marika.

name: marika
normalized: but, miss cara…

name: cara
normalized: drop it.

name: marika
normalized: … yes.
the servant restrained herself, after being rebuked by her mistress.

name: cara
normalized: i am sorry.
i wonder what happened to her.

name: yamakawa
normalized: well, yes… anyway, i have placed the teaching materials on top of the desk for you.
please be sure to use them.

name: cara
normalized: i understand.
thank you.
even though the queen was smiling at me, her knight continued to glare at me pointedly.

name: student
normalized: all rise!
let us show her the proper courtesy!

name: students
normalized: thank you very much.

name: cara
normalized: yes.
this should be enough for today.
it was the lunch break now, as her class ended.
cara came to me first and foremost, before giving the teaching materials back to me, as she had borrowed them from me for her class.

name: cara
normalized: thank you.
you were really helpful.

name: yamakawa
normalized: i am glad to hear that.

name: marika
normalized: i have come to pick you up.
the knightess was already waiting for us, as we stepped out into the corridor.
marika had undoubtedly been in her class until just a while ago as well.
the fact that she was already here meant that she had to have rushed over here, as soon as it had ended.

name: cara
normalized: i have told you that i don't need you to come and pick me up, haven't i?

name: marika
normalized: excuse me but that won't do.

name: cara
normalized: wait a moment… marikaa?
she said that, after looking at me through the corners of her eyes.
and then, the servant shoved her mistress's back, while forcibly dragging her away from me.
the incident that had transpired in the dining hall during the morning coupled with what had happened just now── she was attempting to completely shield cara from me.
what a nosy woman.
if she continued like this, then it would become impossible for me to train cara during the night.
speaking of which, that annoying woman had been on the verge of disrupting azuma's training as well.
on top of that, planting the bug inside her now wasn't going to be easy, and would pose too great a risk.
i wasn't going to be able to handle both, cara and her.
moreover, if either of them managed to break free from the control of the bug, then it would mean the failure of my plan.
well then, what should i do?
